com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack.messenger.message

Interface TransactionSigningRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IncomingMessage, Message, MessageMeta

    public interface TransactionSigningRequest
extends IncomingMessage, MessageMeta
    Interface of a transaction verify request from the OOB server.
    Since:
    5.3.0

      • createResponse

        @NonNull
TransactionSigningResponse createResponse(@NonNull
                                                   TransactionSigningResponse.TransactionSigningResponseValue response,
                                                   @Nullable
                                                   String otp,
                                                   @Nullable
                                                   Map<String,String> meta)
                                            throws FastTrackException
        Create an outgoing response for the current message.
        Parameters:
        response - The response to provide to the transaction.
        otp - The OTP to send over to OOB server. Can be null only if user denied the transaction.
        meta - The metadata for the message. Can be null.
        Returns:
        The outgoing message ready to be send.
        Throws:
        FastTrackException
        Since:
        5.3.0
